title: The Boy in the Iceberg
plot: The legend of the Avatar is told. Katara and Sokka find a strange boy within an iceberg.

title: The Avatar Returns
plot: Aang and Katara inadvertently set off a trap the brings the warmongering Fire Nation to the Southern Water Tribe's peaceful village at the South Pole.

title: The Southern Air Temple
plot: After his departure from the Southern Air Temple 100 years ago, an excited Aang finally returns home but is disillusioned by what he finds there.

title: The Warriors of Kyoshi
plot: The gang arrives at Kyoshi Island and are captured by some Kyoshi warriors. When Aang reveals that he is the avatar, news quickly spreads out and suddenly reaches to Prince Zuko who then goes to Kyoshi Island to capture him.

title: The King of Omashu
plot: Aang's abilities as an airbender are challenged by a king.

title: Imprisoned
plot: In a nearby Earth Village, the gang meets a teenage earthbender named Haru. This village lives in fear of the Fire Nation, for soldiers there capture any earthbenders they can find.

title: The Spirit World: Winter Solstice, Part 1
plot: Aang and friends visit a village being terrorized by an angry spirit. Iroh is captured by Earth Kingdom soldiers.

title: Avatar Roku: Winter Solstice, Part 2
plot: To contact the spirit of the previous Avatar, Aang must reach a temple in the Fire Nation before the sun sets on the following day. There he will learn what he must do to restore balance to the world. Zuko must defy his banishment to follow Aang.

title: The Waterbending Scroll
plot: Katara, desperate to improve her abilities and teach Aang, steals an expensive waterbending scroll from pirates, causing them to pursue the group.

title: Jet
plot: Aang, Katara, and Sokka have their friendship tested by a charismatic Rebel Leader who is fighting against the Fire Nation.

title: The Great Divide
plot: Aang is tested as the Avatar when he must help two feuding clans cross a dangerous canyon peacefully.

title: The Storm
plot: Aang relives the events after finding out that he is the Avatar 100 years ago and tells them to Katara, while Iroh tells the story of Zuko's scar and banishment to the crew.

title: The Blue Spirit
plot: When Aang is captured by the Fire Nation, his only hope is a mysterious masked figure.

title: The Fortuneteller
plot: The gang visits a village where a fortuneteller lives who is said to never be wrong. Aang tries to show Katara how he feels about her.

title: Bato of the Water Tribe
plot: Sokka and Katara meet a friend of their father who offers to take them to join the Water Tribe's navy. Aang fears his friends will choose seeing their father again over staying with him.

title: The Deserter
plot: When he meets an outcast from the Fire Nation, Aang is impatient to skip ahead in his training.

title: The Northern Air Temple
plot: Aang is upset when he finds an old Air Temple has been desecrated by an old inventor and his son.

title: The Waterbending Master
plot: The heroes finally arrive at the North Pole. But for Katara, the trip may have been in vain, as Master Pakku refuses to teach girls waterbending.

title: The Siege of the North
plot: While Katara herself becomes a great waterbending master, Commander Zhao plans a siege on the Northern Water Tribe. Meanwhile, Sokka's on a mission to stop this siege while Aang tries to buy them some time.

title: The Siege of the North Part 2
plot: As the Fire Nation continues its assault on the Northern Water Tribe, Sokka, Katara and Yue set out on a search for Aang, being guided by his spirit.

title: The Avatar State
plot: Aang and friends arrive in the Earth Kingdom to begin his earthbending training, but a local general convinces Aang that all he needs to do is learn to control his Avatar state. Azula, Zuko's sister, arrives to escort her brother and uncle back to the Fire Nation.

title: The Cave of Two Lovers
plot: On their way to Omashu, Team Avatar is forced to travel underground to avoid Fire Nation attacks. Iroh and Zuko adjust to life as fugitives.

title: Return to Omashu
plot: Finding the city of Aang's old friend, King Bumi, captured by the Fire Nation, the heroes hatch a plan to rescue Aang's earthbending teacher. Azula gathers two old friends to help her hunt the Avatar.

title: The Swamp
plot: Aang hears a swamp calling to him. In the swamp, Aang and the gang find out that this is not any natural swamp.

title: Avatar Day
plot: Sokka and Katara have to solve a centuries-old crime when Aang is imprisoned for a murder allegedly committed by one of his past incarnations.

title: The Blind Bandit
plot: Still searching for an earthbending teacher, Aang and his friends stumble across a small earth village. When they hear about an underground earthbending tournament, they decide to go to it. Aang finds a teacher that fits the description of King Bumi. Her name is Toph Beifong, a blind, 12 year old girl who is tougher than she looks. When they meet, Toph is at first reluctant, because her parents don't know how good of a bender she is. After her parents discover her secret life, she decides that she wants to join the Avatar gang to help him master earthbending.

title: Zuko Alone
plot: As Zuko tries to make it by in exile without his uncle, he remembers how his father became Firelord and what happened to his mother.

title: The Chase
plot: Every time they land, Azula and her warriors find Aang, Katara, Sokka, and Toph. Toph refuses to help set up camp, claiming she carries her own weight and no one else's. After a fight between Aang, Katara and Toph, Toph storms off angrily. Aang lays a decoy trail for Azula and Sokka, Katara, Appa, and Momo, flee the other direction. Aang waits for Azula and is fighting her when Zuko and Iroh arrive. Soon, Katara, and Sokka come to the fight, too. Just as all hope of winning is lost, Toph arrives and, together, the six attack Azula. Knowing she is beat, Azula shots ...

title: Bitter Work
plot: Aang begins to learn earthbending from Toph; Uncle Iroh resumes teaching Zuko firebending to better prepare him for facing Azula, and reveals a new technique he learned from watching waterbenders.

title: The Library
plot: When he learns that there is a lost Library with all the knowledge in the world, Sokka convinces the others to seek it out in hopes of finding a weakness of the Fire Nation.

title: The Desert
plot: Lost in the desert without Appa, Team Avatar must find a way out. Iroh and Zuko make contact with a secret organization.

title: The Serpent's Pass
plot: After getting tickets for the ferry headed to Ba Sing Se, the gang meets an old friend. They skip the ferry ride to help some refugees, one of which is going to have a baby, get to Ba Sing Se. They must lead the refugees through the Serpent's Pass, a dangerous mountain-side path surrounded by water.

title: The Drill
plot: After arriving at the great wall of Ba Sing Se, Aang and the gang discover that the Fire Nation has constructed a great drilling machine to penetrate the wall. The drill is also followed by an army of Fire Nation troops. Also, Zuko and Iroh are having trouble hiding the fact that they are both Firebenders.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
plot: Sokka and his sister Kya - later renamed Katara, must travel the world to find masters for Aang, who is the Avatar. However, they must evade a critical foe, Prince Zuko of the Fire Nation, who wants to capture Aang.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
plot: After getting a house to stay in, Aang and company are given a tour of Ba Sing Se. As they try to get in to tell the Earth King the news, they find that nothing is quite what is seems. Jet is in the city, too, and he is positive that Iroh and Zuko are Firebenders.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
plot: A series of short stories covering some of the time spent by Katara, Toph, Iroh, Sokka, Aang, Zuko and Momo as they live in Ba Sing Se.

title: Appa's Lost Days
plot: In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen, will find out where he has gone and who he has met along the way and more importantly where he is now!

title: Lake Laogai
plot: The Avatar gang encounters Jet in Ba Sing Se and he helps them to discover the location of Appa. But they will end up discovering something else, a secret of the city.

title: The Earth King
plot: The kids battle Long Feng and the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

title: The Guru
plot: Aang receives guidance from Guru Pathik at the Eastern Air Temple; Sokka is reunited with his long-lost father; Princess Azula has something diabolical in store for her enemies; Uncle and Zuko run their own tea shop.

title: The Crossroads of Destiny
plot: The heroes work together to stop Azula's destructive plans; Zuko finds companionship in an unlikely source and learns the time has come to make an imperative choice about his future.

title: The Awakening
plot: Weeks after the fall of the Earth Kingdom, Aang and his friends must infiltrate the Fire Nation. Katara meets her father for the first time in years. Zuko returns home, but is uneasy with his newfound reputation.

title: The Headband
plot: Posing as a regular kid, Aang goes to a Fire Nation school and sees what's missing from their lives. Zuko visits his uncle in prison.

title: The Painted Lady
plot: When Aang and his friends come across a fishing village being poisoned by a nearby factory, a local legend comes to life to help the townspeople.

title: Sokka's Master
plot: After deciding he's the least valuable member of the team, Sokka seeks an apprenticeship with a sword-master. The rest of the gang tries to adjust to being without him. The imprisoned Iroh may not be as beaten as he seems.

title: The Beach
plot: On a forced vacation, Zuko, Azula, Ty Lee and Mai try to blend in with normal teenagers and learn about themselves and one another. Aang and company are attacked by an ominous assassin.

title: The Avatar and the Fire Lord
plot: Both Aang and Zuko must learn the history of how the war began. Zuko learns a secret about his great-grandfather's past.

title: The Runaway
plot: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

title: The Puppetmaster
plot: Creepy things are afoot when the gang meets a mysterious old innkeeper with a secret.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
plot: As the invasion approaches, Aang has recurring nightmares about being unprepared to face the Firelord. Zuko feels the perks and pressures of being the prince again.

title: The Day of Black Sun
plot: Zuko makes a decision about his future. Aang reunites with many of his old friends in a full-scale invasion of the Fire Nation capitol to coincide with an eclipse which will remove the Fire Nation's powers.

title: The Day of Black Sun
plot: The invasion seems to be succeeding until Aang learns that their arrival was anticipated. Zuko confronts his father.

title: The Western Air Temple
plot: The gang hides out in the Western Air Temple. Zuko tries to convince the gang of his change in heart, but they are very hesitant. Combustion Man/Sparky-Sparky Boom Man attacks again.

title: The Firebending Masters
plot: Zuko has joined up with Aang's group and is now ready to teach Aang fire bending. Unfortunately, Zuko has found out that he has lost his ability and must now relearn it. Zuko and Aang travel to find the original source of fire bending so that they both can learn from The Firebending Masters.

title: The Boiling Rock: Part 1
plot: Sokka and Zuko head to the Fire Nation's most heavily guarded prison -- the Boiling Rock -- in hopes to find and break-out the captured invasion force.

title: The Boiling Rock
plot: The escape is planned and the heroes attempt to break from the prison that very day. But problems come when Azula, Mai and Ty Lee arrive at the prison.

title: The Southern Raiders
plot: Trying to prove that she can trust him, Zuko helps Katara track down the man who killed her mother.

title: The Ember Island Players
plot: The gang, now hiding at Ember Island, watch a play about themselves and their adventures.

title: Sozin's Comet
plot: Sozin's Comet is only three days away. Zuko tells the others what the Fire Lord plans on the day of the comet and the gang realizes that they must stop him before then. But Aang doubts that he can do what is expected of him.

title: Sozin's Comet
plot: Aang awakes on a mysterious island and confronts his past lives for advice on how to stop the Fire Lord without killing him. The rest of the group searches for Aang.

title: Sozin's Comet
plot: Zuko battles his sister with Katara's help for the right to be named Fire Lord. Elsewhere, Aang meets Ozai just as the comet arrives.

title: Sozin's Comet
plot: Aang's moment of truth arrives. Can he defeat Ozai, the Phoenix King? Will he be forced to take a human life? All the characters face their greatest challenges.

title: Welcome to Republic City
plot: Korra, the new Avatar, travels to Republic city to start her Airbending training.

title: A Leaf in the Wind
plot: Against Tenzin's prohibition, a frustrated Korra sneaks out to visit the pro-bending sports arena.

title: The Revelation
plot: Korra attempts to infiltrate the Equalist movement and learn more about its mysterious leader.

title: The Voice in the Night
plot: Korra becomes part of Councilman Tarrlok's task force which aims to rid Republic City of the Equalists.

title: The Spirit of Competition
plot: As Asami steals Mako's heart, Korra struggles to express her feelings for Mako and also at the same time Bolin tries to win Korra's heart by being brave enough to ask Korra to go out with him. The tension gets higher as the Pro bending tournament starts.

title: And the Winner Is...
plot: Korra and the Fire Ferrets are in the pro-bending championship, but will the Equalists allow the game to go on?

title: The Aftermath
plot: Korra suspects that an ally is working with the Equalists.

title: When Extremes Meet
plot: Korra faces off with Councilman Tarrlok as Equalist activity continues to rise in Republic City.

title: Out of the Past
plot: After being imprisoned by Tarrlok, Korra attempts to analyze the mysterious visions she has been having. Meanwhile, Tenzin, Lin, Mako, Bolin and Asami search for Korra, having been given false information by Tarrlok.

title: Turning the Tides
plot: The Equalists begin their attack on Republic City.

title: Skeletons in the Closet
plot: Korra and the rest of Team Avatar go into hiding in Gommu's underground shelter where benders and non-benders live together in harmony.

title: Endgame
plot: The duel between Amon and Korra - will Korra be powerful enough to beat Amon?

title: Rebel Spirit
plot: Korra struggles to find a deeper connection with the Spirit World as she and the gang attend a Southern Water Tribe festival.

title: The Southern Lights
plot: Korra and Chief Unalaq journey into a dangerous maelstrom and find a source of great spiritual power.

title: Civil Wars: Part 1
plot: While tensions flare between the Northern and Southern Water Tribes, Korra struggles to remain neutral.

title: Civil Wars: Part 2
plot: When Korra's parents are wrongfully arrested, Korra fights for their freedom.

title: Peacekeepers
plot: When the President of the United Republic refuses to help Korra, she decides to take matters into her own hands.

title: The Sting
plot: When Triad activity threatens to put Future Industries out of business, Mako performs an investigation and discovers a much bigger conspiracy.

title: Beginnings, Part 1
plot: Korra learns about the epic and mythic origins of the first Avatar.

title: Beginnings, Part 2
plot: Korra delves deeper into the Avatar's past and realizes what she must do in order to restore balance between the physical and spirit worlds.

title: The Guide
plot: Korra seeks Tenzin's help to enter the Spirit World for the first time.

title: A New Spiritual Age
plot: Korra enters the Spirit World and struggles with the Avatar's relationship with the spirits.

title: Night of a Thousand Stars
plot: When President Raiko is attacked, Bolin saves the day.

title: Harmonic Convergence
plot: Korra and company attempt to close the spirit portals before Harmonic Convergence.

title: Darkness Falls
plot: Korra discovers a new twist in Unalaq's evil plan. Meanwhile, Tenzin realizes he must face his own demons in order to save his daughter.

title: Light in the Dark
plot: Korra discovers a way she may be able to defeat the ultimate dark spirit and save the world.

title: A Breath of Fresh Air
plot: As Korra tries to restore the streets of Republic city, she learns that her decision to keep the spirit portals open has created a new conflict between humans and spirits, and triggered the emerging of new Airbenders.

title: Rebirth
plot: As the Avatar team faces difficulties while searching for new airbenders, Zaheer makes the next step in his plan.

title: The Earth Queen
plot: Korra and Asami collect tax money for Queen Hou Ting. Mako and Bolin suffer an unexpected family reunion. Kai can't get rid of his old habit. Lord Zuko visits a secret prison in Northen Water Tribe.

title: In Harm's Way
plot: Korra finds out that the Earth Queen imprisoned airbenders to create an army. Jenora leads an investigation with her spiritual projection. Lin joins the Avatar Team.

title: The Metal Clan
plot: Korra, Mako, Bolin and Asami visit Sao Fu, the city of Metal Clan. Lin does not want to meet her past. Suyin tells her life story. Air Temple Island training camp has a new recruit.

title: Old Wounds
plot: Korra practices metal bending. Lin takes an acupuncture session. Zaheer, Ghazan, Ming-Hua and P'Li escape Republic City.

title: Original Airbenders
plot: Though contending with Bumi's bad attitude, Tenzin tries to train the new members of the Air Nation.

title: The Terror Within
plot: As Opal leaves for the Northern Air Temple to start her airbending training, Zaheer and his gang try to kidnap Korra. Although Korra's friends are able to prevent this following a climactic fight, they suspect that someone inside Zaofu has been aiding the enemy.

title: The Stakeout
plot: While tracking Aiwei, Korra finds out more about Zaheer's motivations and purposes. Team Avatar is chased by both Zaheer's gang and the Earth Queen.

title: Long Live the Queen
plot: Korra and Asami are captured by Earth Kingdom forces and held in an airship en route to Ba Sing Se, and Asami's escape plan leads to a worse situation.

title: The Ultimatum
plot: As Ba Sing Se continues to erupt into chaos, Mako and Bolin struggle to leave the city to deliver Zaheer's message to Korra they were going to attack the Northern Air Temple.

title: Enter the Void
plot: Team Avatar hatches a plan to save the Airbenders, but all is not what it seems like. Zaheer rediscovers an old Airbender talent. The motive of the Red Lotus is finally revealed.

title: Venom of the Red Lotus
plot: After being captured and poisoned by the Red Lotus, Korra must fight to keep herself from being killed in the Avatar State, which would end the entire Avatar Cycle forever.

title: After All These Years
plot: The Metal Clan's new leader Kuvira is making some big changes. In Republic City, people are waiting to see Korra again but something is wrong.

title: Korra Alone
plot: While Korra is struggling with PTSD by the metal poison Zaheer injected in her, she sets off on a journey to try to connect with Raava. Amidst all of this, Tenzin and the others realize that Korra has gone missing after 6 months.

title: The Coronation
plot: The Coronation of the new King of Earth Kingdom while Kuvira does not agree with it. While on other hand Korra is practicing with Toph to better herself.

title: The Calling
plot: The airbender children, Jinora, Ikki and Meelo, head out to find the Avatar. Meanwhile, Toph teaches Korra to let go of the past.

title: Enemy at the Gates
plot: Kuvira threatens Zaofu; Bolin is caught in the middle of the bad blood between Su Beifong and Kuvira.

title: The Battle of Zaofu
plot: Korra returns to her role as the avatar, but is she really ready for action? Bolin and Varrick break away from Kuvira's army.

title: Reunion
plot: Korra returns to Republic city and team avatar faces their first mission together in 3 years when prince Wu goes missing. Bolin and Varick are on the lam.

title: Remembrances
plot: Wu begins his exile with Mako's family, and realizes that he knows nothing about his bodyguard. So Mako tells him the story of how he met Korra and their relationship since then, effectively catching the audience up from book 1- now.

title: Beyond the Wilds
plot: The spirit vines in Republic City start abducting people and it's up to Korra to figure out why.

title: Operation Beifong
plot: Bolin helps Opal and Lin save the Beifongs from Kuvira. Korra visits the Spirit World looking for help.

title: Kuvira's Gambit
plot: Korra and Team Avatar try to stop Kuvira from moving against Republic City.

title: Day of the Colossus
plot: Team Avatar clashes with Kuvira on the streets of Republic City; Pema and Prince Wu help evacuate innocent citizens.

title: The Last Stand
plot: When Korra comes face to face with Kuvira, the fate of the Earth Kingdom and the Avatar's life are at stake.

title: Echoes of Thunder
plot: As the human kingdom of Katolis braces for an attack by Moonshadow elves, King Harrow makes plans to send sons Callum and Ezran away to a safe place.

title: What is Done
plot: Determined to make up for her mistake, Rayla sneaks into the castle and corners Callum. Lord Viren offers the king a way to survive the attack.

title: Moonrise
plot: With night falling, Rayla and the princes race to share what they've found and stop the attack. But first they'll have to get past Claudia.

title: Bloodthirsty
plot: Excited about his newfound powers, Callum convinces the others to travel to the Banther Lodge for a magic cube. Katolis prepares to crown a new king.

title: An Empty Throne
plot: Callum struggles to control his magic, General Amaya clashes with Lord Viren, and a trip down the river takes a hair-raising turn.

title: Through the ice
plot: After a run-in with a soldier, Rayla leads the princes to high ground. Viren gives Soren and Claudia secret orders as they set out on their mission.

title: The Dagger and The Wolf
plot: In a nearby village, Callum and Ezran seek help for the egg while Rayla hunts down a magic blade. Claudia collects ingredients for a tracking spell.

title: Cursed Caldera
plot: Ellis leads the friends to the Cursed Caldera but warns it's crawling with nasty monsters. Viren tries to force Runaan to talk.

title: Wonderstorm
plot: Ezran, Callum and Rayla each put their special talents to use as they make their way up the mountain in a desperate bid to save the egg.

title: A Secret and a Spark
plot: Callum, Ezran and Rayla go with Lujanne. As Callum asks Lujanne to teach him magic and Ezran tries to teach Zym how to fly, Rayla senses danger approaching.

title: Half Moon Lies
plot: After a fierce showdown with Rayla, Soren and Claudia argue about the best way to deal with the princes. Rayla worries she's kept a secret too long.

title: Smoke and Mirrors
plot: Callum searches for a way to tell Ezran the sad news, and Rayla sets a trap for Claudia and Soren. Viren watches a mysterious figure in the mirror.

title: Voyage of the Ruthless
plot: After saying goodbye to Phoe-Phoe, the gang teams up with a pirate to cross a bay, where Callum tries to forge a connection with the sky arcanum.

title: Breaking the Seal
plot: At the summit of the five kingdoms, Viren fights to win the support of a young queen. Flashbacks reveal a key moment from King Harrow's reign.

title: Heart of a Titan
plot: The attack on the Magma Titan has devastating consequences for two kingdoms. In his letter, Harrow shares a lie, a secret and a wish for the princes.

title: Fire and Fury
plot: When Soren picks a fight with a dragon, chaos breaks out and Rayla faces a difficult decision. A defeated Viren returns to the figure in the mirror.

title: The Book of Destiny
plot: Callum pays a price for dabbling in dark magic. Claudia searches desperately for a way to help Soren, and Ezran makes a heartbreaking discovery.

title: Breathe
plot: After using his gift to help Claudia, Ezran makes an important decision about the quest. Callum wakes up with a new understanding of primal magic.
